articles.author: iDNES.cz
articles.title: Xiaomi is in search of camera phones. The novelty is surpassed by its two-year-old predecessor - iDNES.cz
articles.description: The latest Xiaomi 13 Ultra smartphone scored 140 points in the DxO Mark camera test, ranking it alongside other top-performing smartphones such as the Google Pixel 7, Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra, and Vivo X90 Pro+. The Xiaomi 13 Pro has more advanced camera hardware than the Ultra model, but only scored four points higher in the DxO Mark test. The Xiaomi Mi11 Ultra, which is two years old, outperformed the Xiaomi 13 Ultra in the test. However, the Xiaomi 13 Ultra is still an excellent camera phone and belongs to the top tier of mobile photography. It is not officially sold in the Czech Republic, so its ranking is more of a curiosity.

articles.author: Novinky.cz
articles.title: At least two drones fell in the Moscow region - Novinky.cz
articles.description: Drones have crashed in Moscow without causing any injuries or damage. The governor of the Moscow region, Andrej Vorobjov, reported that the drones were "captured" as they approached military warehouses in the area. Three drones crashed in total, with one being shot down by Russians near the village of Lukino. The attack follows a similar incident in May, which resulted in two injuries and damage to several homes. The Russian Ministry of Defence blamed Ukraine for the May attack, but Ukraine denied involvement.

articles.author: Vogue Business
articles.title: How China fell in love with designer knitwear - Vogue Business
articles.description: This article discusses the rebranding of knitwear in China as independent designers embrace the design possibilities of cashmere and fine knits. Ruohan, a Chinese knitwear label, is collaborating with Chinese cashmere giant Erdos on a collection to launch this September. The article highlights the success of independent knitwear brands in China, driven in part by a growing preference among consumers for understated luxury.

articles.author: Nikon
articles.title: Nikon releases the NIKKOR Z 180-600mm f/5.6-6.3 VR, a super-telephoto zoom lens for the Nikon Z mount system | News - Nikon
articles.description: Nikon has released the NIKKOR Z 180-600mm f/5.6-6.3 VR, a super-telephoto zoom lens compatible with full-frame/FX-format mirrorless cameras for which the Nikon Z mount has been adopted. The lens offers superior agility and outstanding operability, allowing users to capture powerful, up-close shots of subjects at a distance, such as birds, wildlife, and airplanes. The lens also has a broad range of focal lengths, making it ideal for shooting a wide variety of scenes and subjects with a single lens. The lens is lightweight and has vibration reduction (VR) with an effect of 5.5 stops, enabling superior agility.

articles.description: This article provides tips on accessories for summer road trips, such as USB adapters, storage organizers, mini-fridges, and tablet holders.
